welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Humanes de Madrid, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, handling most international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for domestic flights and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal used for both domestic and international flights, mainly by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Barajas Airport, used for most international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 15 minutes.
